![](https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/images/logo.png)

Here is your last chance to get our Cyber Monday special. This deal is looking really similar to our old MooseVZ division, but with higher specification and lower price ;)

<b>CM15-OVZ512</b>

* 1 CPU Core
* 512 MB Dedicated RAM
* Disk Space 50GB
* 1 Dedicated IPv4
* IPv6 Subnet
* 1 TB Bandwidth on 1Gbps port
* OpenVZ Technology
* Location: Montreal, Atlanta, Miami, Dallas, Los Angeles

Price: 15.00$ CAD by year  (~$10-12 USD)  
<b>Order link:</b> http://gdbi.pw/cm15

<i>This deal is valid until supply last. Hurry!</i>

<hr />

* All our VPS support TUN/TAP/PPP
* We accept TOR Relay on our Dedicated IPv4 VPS. Read AuP for more information
* We accept Paypal, Stripe and Bitcoin (via Bitpay)
* Looking Glass: https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/faq.html
* We speak French and English. You can reach us 24/7, via the following link: http://gdbi.pw/contact

Regards, David.
